activity/pryv.example:
#### Time working on a specific project
timeframe: 26th june 2013, form 9am to 12am

story: In your company "ACME Inc." you note that you did some "Design work" on the project "Comics review".

explanation: We note an "amount of time" which is a special event data-type (activity/pryv) as it's directly handled by Pryv's Event.
We need to have a dedicated Stream "comic-review" that while contain all the time accounting

datatypes: activity/pryv

stream: activity/work/
activity/pryv.description: Pryv activity event. No specific content here; content is defined by the event's stream, time and duration as well as possible classification (tags).

audio/attached.description:
The audio source is the file attached to the event (no explicit content defined).
Use event.duration for the audio duration

audio/url.description: A reference to an audio file online.

call/undefined.description: A call with an unspecified media

contact/facebook.description: A Facebook user as specified in the Graph API: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/reference/api/user/

contact/vcard.description: A business card in vcard 2.0 - 3.x format. See: rfc2425, rfc2426

encrypted/aes-text-base64.description: AES encrypted payload, with a text key and a Base64 payload.

keyRef.description: A reference (e.g. id, name in keychain) to the key to use for decryption.

hint.description: Alternative to keyRef. A textual hint about which key to use for decryption.

file/attached.description: The file is attached to the event

file/attached-multiple.description: A set of file attached. Structure might be declared in the filenames.

x-headers.description: Key / Value map of X-* headers

post/facebook.description: A Facebook post. See Facebook's API doc for reference. **map**: fbPost.message -> pryvEvent.description fbPost.created_time -> pryvEvent.time **optional** fields such as `link`, `source`, `privacy`.. are optional and can be saved on the object. **attached content**: If a picture is attached to this post, you may want to attach it to the "Pryv" Event. - attach the picture and keep "{filename}.png" in the URL

source.description: Either a fully qualified "URL" for an external source or a "filename" for a Flash Movie or Video attached to this event

properties.description: Relative to "source": A list of properties for an uploaded video, for example, the length of the video

picture.description: Either a fully qualified "URL" for an external picture or a "filename" for a picture attached to this event

status-type.description: One of mobile_status_update, created_note, added_photos, added_video, shared_story, created_group, created_event, wall_post, app_created_story, published_story, tagged_in_photo, approved_friend

post/twitter.description:
A Twitter post.  

`Created_at` property should be used as the timestamp for the event.

Not specified property that can be found in https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1.1/get/statuses/show/%3Aid
can be added to the event

music/soundcloud.description:
See soundcloud track properties http://developers.soundcloud.com/docs/api/reference#tracks
Only the "id" is mandatory, other property depend of sound cloud specifications

note/webclip.description: An HTML-formatted note associated to its source URL.

picture/base64.description: The picture is caried in base64 (utf-8) encoded in string

picture/attached.description: The picture is the image file attached to the event (no explicit content defined). TODO: list accepted formats.

picture/url.description: A reference to a picture file online.

position/wgs84.description: The latest revision of the World Geodetic System (used by GPS).

latitude.description: Unit: degrees north from the equator.

longitude.description: Unit: degrees east from the zero meridian.

horizontalAccuracy.description: The radius of uncertainty for latitude and longitude. Unit: meters. Negative if latitude and longitude are invalid.

verticalAccuracy.description: The radius of uncertainty for altitude. Unit: meters. Negative if altitude is invalid.

speed.description: For informational purposes only. Unit: meters / second. Negative if invalid.

bearing.description: Unit: degrees clockwise from north. Negative if invalid.

video/attached.description: The video is the file attached to the event (no explicit content defined). TODO: list accepted formats.

video/url.description: A reference to an video file online.
